NAME.Nominative: Venerable Eustolia and Sosipatra the Queen

SAINT.LIFE: The Venerable Eustolia from her youth devoted herself to the service of God in the reign of the Emperor Maurice coming from Rome to Constantinople. Here wishing to become a monastic she met Sosipatra, the daughter of the Emperor Maurice.
